isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - CAB ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - MIRRORS - HEATED AND LIGHTED

svcproc.title: MIRRORS - HEATED AND LIGHTED
svcproc.para: Heated Mirror -With the key in the on or accessory position, the heated mirror elements receive power from the ignition relay (462-R1) through 10A fuse F5-A.

Mirror Lights -Power to the mirror lights is controlled by the cab and trailer lights relay (464-R9). Refer to LIGHT SYSTEMS for that system. Power from cab and trailer lights relay (464-R9) is applied to 15A fuse F8-C, which supplies power to operate the mirror lights.
